channel.title: Music – DPR LIVE

item.title: DPR LIVE,DPR CREAM - Gravity
item.description:
You and me
with the gravity
You and me
with the gravity
We’re gonna rock
together
Darling let’s party
to the 80’s beat
And
let’s boogie woogie
Babe
where you taking me
We’re gonna rock
together

Boogie woogie girl
다 됐고 보여 줘
I want it
right now
I don’t wanna
see it slow
애매하게 구는 거
나 싫어
할 거면 확실하게
경고 없이 ya
Show me your danger
show me impatience
Hey gravity
you already know it
Loving your pull
it’s 1에서 100
너는 내게 자꾸만
위험한 아이디얼 줘
너는 나의 마음을
자꾸만 쥐었다 펴
Ever since
I ever felt ya
Right there life
couldn’t seem better
Tulip flowers
in my sweater
Ask me now
is this forever
Ever since
I ever felt ya
Right there life
couldn’t seem better
Tulip flowers
in my sweater
Ask me now
is this forever
Let go oh oh oh
oh oh oh
Oh oh oh
oh oh oh
